title: Jane Leeves
summary: Jane Elizabeth Leeves (born 18 April 1961)[1] is an English actress. She played Daphne Moon on the NBC television sitcom Frasier from 1993 until 2004, for which she was nominated for an Emmy Award and a Golden Globe Award.[2][3] She is also known for her role as Joy Scroggs on TV Land's sitcom Hot in Cleveland.[4]
